meta.name: Florian Dupuis
meta.title: Florian Dupuis | FullStack Developer
meta.description: Freelance Full Stack Web Developer, Designer & Entrepreneur

about.description:
Hello, my name is Florian Dupuis, and I'm a 27-year-old freelance web developer. I've been coding for over 10 years, and I love exploring new technologies in the digital realm, particularly within the web sphere. I've developed a strong interest in both Front-End and Back-End web development, with JavaScript being my specialty. I'm also proficient in the PHP language, and I have extensive experience with CMS platforms such as WordPress and PrestaShop.

I enjoy traveling the world while simultaneously writing lines of code. I've spent 3 years in the United States, 2 years in Canada, and currently reside in France. I'm a soccer lover and enjoy listening to rock music.

I've worked extensively as a freelance developer, and in 2023, I founded a digital agency called Anywhere. For over three years now, I've been working with Groupe ADP | AÃ©roports de Paris, assisting them in their digital transformation by developing innovative functionalities and projects using cutting-edge technologies through Extime.com.
